item.description:
Can you believe 2 years have gone by already?! That's right...after going through roughly 300+ stinky lanyards, 1,500+ batteries, 30+ discs and 875+ members, we are still standing tall (and happy!). So, why not celebrate the gift that keeps on giving by coming to Russell Field this coming Friday. We'll be having our 2 year anniversary party which will contain some action-packed, quirky and suspenseful games, prizes and shenanigans!


Here's what's in store:

  • Pick-up games (of course!)
  • Contests such as, who can throw the disc the furthest through the field goal posts
  • Mini-frisbee games - Frisbee Freeze Tag, Disc Golf and more
  • Socials such as, the human-knot and the game of Wah
  • Cake!



Note the new summer start time of 8:30pm

We're looking to fill up the space rather quickly (the field can hold up to 50 people), so this is probably the one time where we are going to ask you to RSVP. You can still come if you don't, but that's not really helpful since we can't gauge how many folks are coming.


If you are new and are not sure how to get to the field, check out the details on Russell Field. If you have questions, then contact either of the organizers listed for this game day.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us playing on the football field with LED frisbees
item.name: 2yr Boston Frisbee Birthday Bash!
